results.description: Britt Assombalonga ends Middlesbrough's goal drought with a double as they fight back to claim a point at Loftus Road.
results.shortTitle: Assombalonga brace earns point for Boro
results.title: QPR 2-2 Middlesbrough: Britt Assombalonga double secures draw for Boro

thumbnail.altText: Assombalonga is Boro's leading scorer with six goals this season

results.description: Jack Harrison scores one and makes another as Leeds United beat Queens Park Rangers to go top of the Championship.
results.shortTitle: Leeds return top with win over QPR
results.title: Leeds United 2-0 Queens Park Rangers: Tyler Roberts & Jack Harrison send Whites top

results.description: QPR chief executive Lee Hoos says allegations of racist abuse of players have been "swept under the carpet" by Uefa and Fifa.
results.shortTitle: QPR criticise Uefa and Fifa over racism
results.title: QPR criticise Fifa and Uefa over response to alleged racist abuse of Under-18s players

results.description: Brentford beat west London rivals Queens Park Rangers to earn a third Championship victory in a row.
results.shortTitle: Brentford win at west London rivals QPR
results.title: Queens Park Rangers 1-3 Brentford: Ollie Watkins double gives Bees win

results.description: Relive Brentford's Championship victory over QPR as the Bees make it three league wins in a row.
results.title: Relive Brentford's victory at rivals QPR

results.description: Sam Baldock's equaliser helps Mark Bowen to remain unbeaten in two games as Reading manager.
results.title: Queens Park Rangers 2-2 Reading: Sam Baldock equaliser secures point for Reading

results.description: BBC Sport takes you through five things you may have missed in the EFL, including the end of Stoke City's penalty drought.
results.title: EFL: Stoke City score a penalty at last, Brentford beat Millwall in thriller

results.description: Ebere Eze’s late penalty double secures QPR's first victory at Hull for almost half a century as they come from behind to win.
results.shortTitle: Eze penalty double earns QPR win over Hull
results.title: Hull City 2-3 QPR: Ebere Eze's penalty double seals Rangers win over Tigers

thumbnail.altText: Eze has netted six goals this season

results.description: Queens Park Rangers beat Blackburn Rovers in a match that produced five second-half goals at Loftus Road.
results.shortTitle: QPR beat Blackburn in six-goal thriller
results.title: Queens Park Rangers 4-2 Blackburn Rovers: Wells, Eze, Osayi-Samuel & Hugill give Rangers win

results.description: Cardiff defend their unbeaten home record as goals from Sean Morrison, Marlon Pack and Callum Paterson see off Queens Park Rangers.
results.title: Cardiff City 3-0 Queens Park Rangers: Clinical Bluebirds see off visitors

thumbnail.altText: Sean Morrison of Cardiff City celebrates scoring a goal with team-mates

results.description: West Brom boss Slaven Bilic compares Nathan Ferguson to England's Declan Rice after his goal helps them beat QPR and go top of the Championship.
results.shortTitle: Bilic hails 'new Rice' as West Brom go top
results.title: Queens Park Rangers 0-2 West Bromwich Albion: Ferguson and Pereira give Baggies win

results.description: Relive Saturday's English Football League action, as Leeds lose at Charlton and Derby win at home to Birmingham.
results.title: EFL live: Championship, League One & League Two action

results.description: Bartosz Bialkowski's goalkeeping howler sees Millwall slip to defeat against Queens Park Rangers at The Den.
results.title: Millwall 1-2 QPR: Bartosz Bialkowski makes howler as Rangers win at Lions

results.description: QPR midfielder Ilias Chair signs a new three-year contract with the Championship club.
results.shortTitle: Chair signs new three-year QPR deal
results.title: Ilias Chair: QPR midfielder signs new three-year contract

results.description: Queens Park Rangers hold off a spirited fightback from Luton to chalk up their third straight league win.
results.shortTitle: Quick start gives QPR win over Luton
results.title: Queens Park Rangers 3-2 Luton Town: Rangers hold off fightback from Hatters

results.description: Bradford City sign QPR forward Aramide Oteh and AFC Wimbledon midfielder Dylan Connolly on loan.
results.shortTitle: Bradford City sign Oteh and Connolly
results.title: Aramide Oteh & Dylan Connolly: Bradford City sign duo on season-long loan deals

results.description: Jordan Hugill's double helps QPR to back-to-back Championship wins with a 2-1 victory over Sheffield Wednesday.
results.shortTitle: Hugill double gives QPR victory over Owls
results.title: Sheffield Wednesday 1-2 Queens Park Rangers: Jordan Hugill double guides Rangers to win

results.description: Goals from John Marquis and Marcus Harness give League One side Portsmouth victory at QPR in the EFL Cup.
results.title: Queens Park Rangers 0-2 Portsmouth: Marquis and Harness goals see Pompey win

results.description: Sunderland sign defender Joel Lynch on a one-year deal, after his departure from Queens Park Rangers last season.
results.title: Joel Lynch: Sunderland sign ex-QPR defender on a one-year deal

results.description: Queens Park Rangers come from behind to beat Wigan Athletic, who suffer a fifth straight defeat in all competitions.
results.shortTitle: QPR come from behind to beat Wigan
results.title: Queens Park Rangers 3-1 Wigan Athletic: Ebere Eze inspires R's comeback win

thumbnail.altText: Ryan Manning and Jordan Hugill celebrate the striker's goal against Wigan
